role_dependencies: Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that installs Slack on nearly every platform
role_description_full_overview: This repository contains an Ansible role that installs Slack on nearly every platform. Slack is a proprietary business communication platform developed by American software company Slack Technologies. Slack offers many IRC-style features, including persistent chat rooms organized by topic, private groups, and direct messaging.
